version_description:
Tapfere Helden!

Es gibt wunderbare Neuigkeiten: Eine neue Version des Spiels steht bereit, mit allem, worauf ihr gewartet habt:

- Willkommen im Fremden Land: Hitzige Kämpfe mit schrecklichen Bossen und aufregende Belohnungen für euer Team erwarten euch! Seht euch jetzt das neue Schlachtfeld an.
- Neue Skins und Pakete! Verbessert eure Helden mit den Gildenmünzen und macht sie stärker.
- Ein Fehler beim Spielfortschritt auf den iPhones 4, 5 und 5c wurde behoben! Jetzt funktioniert alles einwandfrei!
- Das Problem bei den Arenakampf-Ergebnissen wurde behoben.

Aktualisiert die App, bleibt auf dem Laufenden und bewertet uns mit 5 Sternen!

Brave Heroes!

We have great news for you: a new game version is ready, with everything you were waiting for:
- Welcome to the Outland: hot battles with new dreadful bosses and amazing rewards for your team are waiting for you! Check the new battlefield right now;
- New skins and bundles! Upgrade your heroes with the Outland coins to make them stronger;
- Arena battle results issue is now solved;

Update the app, stay tuned and rate us 5 stars!

Brave Heroes!
Meet the new Hero Wars version! It has various minor bug fixes and improvements.
We constantly update and improve the game so that you could fully enjoy it.

Thanks for your feedback — together we will make the game better!

Brave Hero! New version is already there for you.

Try among the first:
• Guild wars! – Boost your Guardians and Titans, become best of the best and enter a Golden League. Only champions will grab a Major reward. – Are you ready to meet the challenge?
• Level up in one tap! – From now on you can level up your heroes in one tap – More time for gaming
• More Arena rewards! – Arena coins as a bonus for each new victory
• Elmir in Outland! – A new addition to an Outland shop. – Have time to strengthen your team with Elmir

We also fixed some minor bags. Update the app & enjoy!

Breaking news from the Trade Guild!

A number of Dominion's Shops have received new goods:

- Gold in the Tower Shop
- Astrid and Lucas in the Arena Shop
- Artifact Keys and rarest items in the Soul Shop

Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com.

Your Hero Wars team

Outland update!

From friends to highwaymen!
Outland highwaymen took over the Friendship Shop and established new order!

Logic Games in Hero Wars!
- We’re introducing in-game puzzles!
- Find them next to missions on the Campaign map
Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com

Your Hero Wars team

On December 19th, Winter Holidays come to the Dominion!

• New Hero: Sebastian, a bard of legend, is there for his allies in a time of desperate need
• New winter skins
• Fight bosses, earn Holiday Coins, and spend them at the Holiday Shop
• Hero Rework: Lian is now twice as cute and twice as dangerous

Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com.

Your Hero Wars team

Valentine's Day has come to the Dominion!

The Power of Temptation!
- Daredevil, Sebastian, Astrid, and Lucas get new Romantic Skins! Come and get them!

Go Out Guns Blazing!
- Meet the new and improved Daredevil! Improved skills, explosive damage, and mind-blowing fun are waiting for you!

Love Is in the Air!
- Take part in our charming special event and get Daredevil Soul Stones, new avatars, and discounts!

Good luck, Brave Hero!

The Dominion is celebrating St. Patrick's Day! Come on in!

Charming Power of Nature
Celeste, Nebula, and Artemis try on their new Spring Skins for the celebration! Hurry up and unlock them!

Cute and Mischievous
Leprecats have swarmed across the Dominion, and they've got something better than a pot of gold with them! Participate in the special event, collect Leprecats, and win cool rewards!

Have fun, Brave Hero!

The Dominion is celebrating Easter! Let the Egg Hunt begin!

Festivities in Danger!
- Hordes of the Undead threaten the Dominion! Drive them away and save Easter!
- Complete tasks of this Special Event to fight dreadful Bosses!
- Martha and Markus opened their Shops to help you!

Markus Is Back!
- The support hero Markus becomes stronger! Feel the might of the Order!

We are counting on you, Brave Hero!

The Spring is at its peak in Dominion! And with it, exciting festivities are coming!

Outland Update
- More Skins are added to the Outland Chest!
- Now you can unlock more Skins with your Skin Coins! Check them out!

Spring Festivities
- May is a month of celebration and great deals! Don't miss out on fun and amazing offers!
- Say hi to impoved Heidi! Hurry up and see the Monkey Mage in action!

Have fun, Brave Hero!

The Spring is at its peak in Dominion! And with it, exciting festivities are coming!

Outland Update
- More Skins are added to the Outland Chest!
- Now you can unlock more Skins with your Skin Coins! Check them out!

Spring Festivities
- May is a month of celebration and great deals! Don't miss out on fun and amazing offers!
- Say hi to impoved Heidi! Hurry up and see the Monkey Mage in action!

Have fun, Brave Hero!

Witness a new era in the history of the Dominion!

Darkness Falls
The Undead forces are gathering at the borders! Participate in a unique event and dive into dark secrets of the kingdom of Graven!

Artifact Boxes
Complete the Campaign missions to earn special Keys! Use those to open the Artifact Boxes and win awesome rewards!

The future holds many more breathtaking secrets, oh brave Hero! Follow the news so you don't miss them!

Technical updates!
- Various optimizations and small improvements!

Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com.

Your Hero Wars team

Technical updates!
- Various optimizations and small improvements!

Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com.

Good luck, Brave Hero, and remember - we are always here for you: support@herowars.zendesk.com.

Your Hero Wars team

New event, a Hero rebalanced, and really good deals!

Let's Brawl
A whole new special event is here with cool rewards and unconventional rules! Test your strategy in a surprising way!

Black Friday
This time of year is all about great deals and discounts. Check out our unique offers and events!

Magic Unleashed
As his personal Black Friday deal, Kai gets a damage boost. He's ready to take on the strongest of Heroes!

Also various bugs were fixed for your convenience. Have a blast, Brave Hero!

Hark, brave heroes — an update!

Ghost Bridge
A second bridge has been temporarily added to guild competitions. Capture three enemy structures to flank your enemy!

Adventure: Engineering Power
A sandstorm is imminent in the Dominion. Gather the best Engineers and lift the curse that is transforming their homeland into a lifeless desert!

Turn up the heat in these time-limited events!

Solar Skin Sale!
Astrid and Lucas, Ishmael and Tristan have been charged up with solar energy, ready to incinerate their foes!

Now that summer is in full swing, Maya is organizing a Tropical Fair!

Hero Rework

Maya's flower now protects her for a longer time and heals allies more efficiently. The titan-child's other skills deal more damage.

Tropical Fair

Now the whole island is going to celebrate with Maya! Enjoy vibrant summer avatars, huge discounts, unlimited items in the Tropical Shop, and activity bonuses.

Join Maya and enjoy the summertime while it lasts!
